title: BSc
about:
I'm a Vienna based information technology enthusiast who loves staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies. Over the years I've gathered a lot of practical experience in using the Microsoft technology stack, but I'm always looking for possibilities to expand my knowledge.

In my free time I enjoy movies, series, concerts, books, games, DIYing and mediocre gardening.

education.details:
Graduated as Bachelor of Science (Grade "Good")
Thesis: Using WebAssembly to bring C# to the Web (Grade "Excellent")
